page.title: 14HOW SUNDAY IS SPENT.
page.content: The first person we interviewed was the local doctor's wife.We asked her what she does on a typical Sunday,and this is what she said.First of all she milks the goats and she also feeds the horse and chickens.We asked if she goes to Church but she doesn't.Then we asked her what she does in her spare time.She said she goes riding and looking after the animals. The next person we interviewed told us what she did on a typical Sunday.She gets up early,cleans and milks the goats and goes out visiting relatives.She goes out at night to the Jazz club in Colchester.We asked her if she goes to Church but she said she doesn't. Then we asked her what she does in her spare time,and she said she does a lot of gardening and looking after the animals.She also does a lot of walking,cycling and reading.
